summary: Black screen appears when rotating device

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Install OpenStreetMapViewer-4.0-aligned.apk and start rotating device (do it few times). What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I should see map with tiles but instead black screen appears. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid - 4.0 android - 4.1.1 and 2.3.6 Please provide any additional information below. The same happens when I use MapView in my apps. ANR: http://pastebin.com/hn9yBM0T Exception: http://pastebin.com/Ci555Atm My test devices: Samsung GT-P3110 - 4.1.1 and HTC Nexus One - 2.3.7.
